attributes.review: this was by far the worst app i’ve downloaded! i wanted to download this app to see what everyone was talking about and i couldn’t stay in the app for longer than 3 seconds without the app crashing and making my entire phone glitch. i had to reset my phone three times to get it back to normal. i do not recommend this app at all! do. not. download!
attributes.title: horrible app
